ARABIC: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not be deceived by the fact that those who are kafir move freely about the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Be not deceived by the comings and goings of unbelievers in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Messenger!) Do not let the strutting about of the unbelievers in the land deceive you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), do not be deceived by the changing activities of the unbelievers in different parts of the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O listener (followers of this Prophet)! Do not ever be deceived by the disbelievers’ free movements in the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Let not the free disposal (and affluence) of the disbelievers throughout the land deceive you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Let it not deceive you that those who disbelieve go to and fro in the cities fearlessly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Let it not delude thee, that the unbelievers go to and fro in the land;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Let not the vicissitude (of the success) of those who disbelieve, in the land, deceive thee (O Muhammad).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not be deceived by the actions of those who deny the truth in the land:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Let not beguile thee the moving to and fro about of those who disbelieve, in the cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Never be misled by the bustle of the faithless in the towns.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Let not the strutting about of the Unbelievers through the land deceive thee:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Let not the free disposal (and affluence) of the disbelievers throughout the land deceive you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not let the coming and going in the land of those who disbelieve delude you;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do not be impressed by the disbelievers’ movements in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Be not deceived by the [uninhibited] movement of the disbelievers throughout the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:196] When the Muslims began to say, ‘Look at the enemies of God, how comfortable they are, while we are struggling!’, the following was revealed: Let it not delude you, that the disbelievers go to and fro in the land, engaging in commerce and acquiring profit:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then reminded them of the evanescence of this world and of the continuity of the Hereafter, and encouraged them to seek the latter, saying: (Let not the vicissitude (of the success) of those who disbelieve in the land) the coming and going of the Jews for trade, (deceive thee) Muhammad! Although Muhammad is here the addressee, this is directed at his Companions.
